definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.chinese: 然而，金星人是雌雄同體的。

sentences.english: It is not unlike the idea of androgyny , which is a duality complete.
sentences.chinese: 它與雌雄同體的概念不同，是一個完全的二元性。

sentences.english: Twentieth-century Western woman is truly an androgynous creature.
sentences.chinese: 二十世紀的西方婦女確實是雌雄同體的生靈。

sentences.english: A gut is present, and most of these flukes are monoecious .
sentences.chinese: 腸道存在，這些吸蟲的大多數是雌雄同體的。

sentences.english: They are rare in the plant kingdom, and many plants are hermaphrodite.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中比較少見，因爲許多植物體爲雌雄同體。

sentences.english: She didn't wear makeup, dressed in baggy, androgynous clothing, sang Western songs.
sentences.chinese: 化妝，穿鬆垮垮又雌雄同體的衣服，唱了西方歌。

sentences.english: Most flatworms are hermaphrodite and, in tapeworms, self-fertilization usually takes place.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的扁蟲雌雄同體，絛蟲常常進行自體受精。

definition: trying to hide it makes it more conspicuous (idiom); A cover up only makes matters worse.
to massacre one another (idiom); internecine strife
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
original identity fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth
sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4
